2164.subject: MLML
2164.descrlong:
MLML 124:Mar Invert Zoo I-  A field-oriented introduction to the structure, systematics, evolution, and life histories of the major and minor marine phyla. Offered through Moss Landing Marine Laboratories (MLML); contact ESSP program office for MLML registration procedures. (Offered spring semester.)

(Prereq: Exclude Freshmen and Sophomore and Junior)
